Title: Sixty years of the great Chinese Communist Party 1921-1981
Notes: Part of a series marking the 60th anniversary of the CCP. Subtitled "Restore the national economy and complete three major transformations" (恢复国民经济完成三大改造), this third part (of three) covers the "Basically complete the period of socialist transformation 1949-1956" (基本完成社会主义改造时期 1949-1956).It shows Mao Zedong's "On the Ten Major Relationships" (April 1956); Mao Zedong; Liu Shaoqi; Zhou Enlai; Zhu De; Chen Yun; Deng Xiaoping; Eighth CCP National Congress (September 1956).
Theme: The Founding of the Chinese Communist Party (1921)Liu ShaoqiZhou EnlaiZhu DeChen YunDeng Xiaoping
Tags: National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party
